submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, h: List[int], v: List[int]) -> int:
        h.sort()
        v.sort()
        hn = len(h)
        vn = len(v)
        i = hn-1
        j = vn - 1
        ii,jj=1,1
        ans = 0
        while(i>=0 and j>=0):
            if(h[i]<v[j]):
                ans += v[j]*jj
                ii+=1

                j-=1
            else:
                ans += h[i]*ii
                jj+=1
                i-=1
            
        while(i>=0):
            ans+=h[i]*ii
            i-=1
        while(j>=0):
            ans+= v[j]*jj
            j-=1
        return ans
